weapons.title: Weapons Shop
weapons.description:
To buy any weapon, use `{usage}`.

**9mm:** Damage: 20 | <:granex:874481096799186955> 5.000 `(10% chance of success in robberies)`
**PT 100:** Damage: 40 | <:granex:874481096799186955> 10.000 `(15% chance of success in robberies)`
**Glock:** Damage: 60 | <:granex:874481096799186955> 12.000 `(20% chance of success in robberies)`
**MT-40:** Damage: 120 | <:granex:874481096799186955> 24.000 `(25% chance of success in robberies)`
**Uzi:** Damage: 130 | <:granex:874481096799186955> 28.000 `(30% chance of success in robberies)`
**MP5:** Damage: 150 | <:granex:874481096799186955> 32.000 `(35% chance of success in robberies)`
**UMP:** Damage: 150 | <:granex:874481096799186955> 33.000 `(40% chance of success in robberies)`
**Carabina CT-40:** Damage: 200 | <:granex:874481096799186955> 45.000 `(45% chance of success in robberies)`
**Carabina 556:** Damage: 220 | <:granex:874481096799186955> 48.000 `(50% de chance em assaltos)`
**ParaFal:** Damage: 250 | <:granex:874481096799186955> 56.000 `(55% chance of success in robberies)`
**M4A1:** Damage: 300 | <:granex:874481096799186955> 62.000 `(60% chance of success in robberies)`
**AK-9:** Damage: 400 | <:granex:874481096799186955> 78.000 `(65% de chance de sucesos em assaltos)`
**AK-47:** Damage: 420 | <:granex:874481096799186955> 81.000 | `(70% chance of success in robberies)`
**AKM:** Damage: 430 | <:granex:874481096799186955> 84.000 `(75% chance of success in robberies)`
**SCAR:** Damage: 500 | <:granex:874481096799186955> 97.000 `(80% chance of success in robberies)`
**Gun License:** <:granex:874481096799186955> 500
**Bulletproof Vest:** Defense: 120 | <:granex:874481096799186955> 6.000

**Hamburguer:** <:granex:874481096799186955> 225 (restore 35% from energy)

vehicles.title: Vehicles Shop
vehicles.description:
To buy any vehicle, use `{usage}`

**Motorcycle:** <:granex:874481096799186955> 15.000 `(can be used to work at uber eats)`
**Car:** <:granex:874481096799186955> 25.000 `(can be used to work at uber)`
**Truck:** <:granex:874481096799186955> 105.000 `(can be used to work at trucker)`

farm.title: Farm Shop
farm.description:
Para comprar qualquer item relacionado a fazenda, ou até mesmo a fazenda, use `{usage}`.
**Fazenda:** <:granex:874481096799186955> 400.000 `(libera o emprego de fazendeiro)`
**Galinha:** <:granex:874481096799186955> 100 `(aumenta o lucro da fazenda em 5%)`
**Vaca:** <:granex:874481096799186955> 550 `(aumenta o lucro da fazenda em 15%)`
**Alface:** <:granex:874481096799186955> 25 `(aumenta o lucro da fazenda em 5%)`
**Tomate:** <:granex:874481096799186955> 30 `(aumenta o lucro da fazenda em 5%)`
**Cenoura:** <:granex:874481096799186955> 30 `(aumenta o lucro da fazenda em 5%)`

embed.title: Vote for Me
embed.description:
Vote for me to help me to be promoted to more and more people here on the platform!

 Did you know that by voting for me you can win up to 800 granex? And did you know that by voting for me on both the **top.gg** and **discordbotlist.com** you can win 2300 granex? What are you waiting for? Vote now!

embed.title: Add Me!
embed.description:
You can invite me to your server or to server that you manage clicking in the button below.

Do you need help? Enter in my Discord server and ask your questions there!

embed.title: Howdy! I'm Maneki Neko
embed.description:
Howdy! I'm Maneki Neko, and I'm a powerful Discord bot with multiple features, such as configuration, economy, social, miscellaneous, RPG, e utils, besides being able to interact in Brazilian Portuguese and American English.

I'm currently on {guilds} guilds, I know {users} diferent people and I have {commands} commands.

I was developed in [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/) using the [Eris](https://abal.moe/Eris/) library.
[`{dev}`](https://github.com/Levi0100) is my developer.

embed.title: My Commands
embed.description:
To see more information about a given command, use `{usage}`.
Need help? Join my Discord server to answer your questions by clicking the button below!

It is recommended that you use good weapons with good artifacts and good vests with good artifacts, as this increases your chance of winning.

The match starts <t:{startsIn}:R>

cleiton.description:
The bloodiest boss of all!

Possessing an incredible 200,000 HP, it is the most powerful boss, and can deal between 2300 and 5788 damage to its victims.

vladimir.description:
The boss that has the best defense of all!

Possessing an incredible 90,000 HP, it is the boss with the best defense and has comparable damage to the **Cleiton Trovoada** boss.

helper.level_up: <a:confetti:975932983213166632> Congratulations, you have upgraded to level {level}! Keep interacting with me to level up even more.
helper.tax:
**TAX ALERT**

All players that have 100 or more granex have 1% of that amount withheld from the bank. This is to keep the economy going and keep the bank from going broke lol.

**How the Tax Works**

 It's simple, if you have 100 granex or more, I will simply take 1% of that granex and transfer it to the bank. Here's how it works:
If you have 1 million granex, just multiply that by `0.01` and you will see what 1% of 1 million is — `1000000 * 0.01 = 10000` — so 10,000 granex will be taken from you. Also remember that this calculation works for any amount of granex you have.

**Award:** {granex} granex and {exp} EXP

If you didn't win, good luck next time.
